title: Leave It to Rina!
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>So because of that, we’re thinking of using helis for μ’s members’ live performance~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Amazing.... The scale is way different. I’m.... looking forward to it. Rina-chan’s board「Excited」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>But I’m not sure what to do with the camera on the skydiving part that Rin wanted~. And we can’t really put cameras on their bodies either....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Rina-chan’s board「A-ha」I.... want to help<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What? How exactly?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I.... can use drones to.... film everyone<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It’s going to be a great stage.... Mari-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yes! All thanks to your support, Rina!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I.... will research how to.... make several drones work together! Just wait.... μ’s members!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
